Instruction: In a bowl, beat the eggs.'
In another bowl, mix breadcrumbs, grated Parmesan cheese, salt, and black pepper.'
Dip each avocado wedge into the beaten eggs, then coat with the breadcrumb mixture.'
'Place the coated avocado wedges on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.'
Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until avocado fries are golden brown and crispy.'
'Remove from oven and let cool slightly before serving.'
'Serve warm with your favorite dipping sauce.'
